amendment.description: Amendment makes clear that coordination areas have to be managed using the same standards as refuges; and makes clear that recreational activities can be permitted only when the Secretary of the Interior determines that they would not detract form the overall mission of the refuge system.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit any new use of a Coordinated Conservation Area or refuge made available to a state without a determination from the Secretary of the Interior that the proposed new use is compatible with existing hunting, fishing and game watching activities currently in use in the area.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boehlert amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
